We do not accept hate speech in the game.
And then BHVR In the future, Dead by Daylight sales and in-game purchases will be completely stopped on the territory of the Russian Federation and Belarus on all platforms.
What kind of BHVR hypocrites are you, today you turned off for people who are against the war and generally NOT INVOLVED in it the opportunity to buy a game on the territory of the Russian Federation, DLS and golden cells. BRAVO!
I love this game and I want to continue to enjoy new characters in it, new skins. But you took away this right from me and from the entire Russian-speaking community Dead by Daylight... Thank you BHVR.

4주년이라고 유튜버들이 하도 많이 하고 재밌다고 느껴서 시작해봤지만 뉴비들이 시작하기엔 너무 극악적인 매칭이 되어버립니다 16랭을 웃돌고 있지만 항상 한자리수 살인마를 만나고 출국까지 해보았지만 결과는 역시나였고 어딜가든 빨랭살인마와 마주하니 재미는 처음과 달리 점점더 내려가는중 이제 방법은 내가 고인물이 되는 수 밖에 없다는 쓸쓸한 현실
這遊戲沒有休閒場只有牌位場，匹配機制還爛到誇張，新手玩鬼遇到的都是紅段紫段這種高牌位的玩家，不是說遇到高手不行，但這實力差距根本沒辦法學到甚麼東西或進步，都是去給人嘲諷而已。鬼的遊戲體驗真的差到不行。想買這款遊戲的人真的勸你省下錢買其他更好玩的遊戲。
游戏是好游戏 队友是脑残队友

神ゲー。

　プレイ時間6時間
レースシムとボードゲームメインで初めてマルチプレイを買いました。
慣れておらず、スキルチェック失敗ばかりします。それでも面白い。やめられない。
自分だけじゃなく、毎回スキルチェック失敗する人とマッチングします。そういうレベル差のマッチングが嫌な人には難しいかもしれないが、他のゲームにはない、例え脱出できなくてもドキドキ感が本当にある。

　プレイ時間18時間
殺人鬼が有利すぎる気がします。
youtubeで上級者のチェイスを見てもそう毎回逃げ切れるわけでもない。
ただでさえ速い殺人鬼が遠隔攻撃、より速い能力などを備えるとほぼ脱出は不可能では？
DLCを販売したい気持ちも分かるが、あまり殺人鬼を強くするとゲームバランスが壊れる気がする。

クロスプレイになってマッチングが早くなったのは良かった。

Well, even when I do enjoy playing this game and I would/will recommend it to others, I think it should be much more enjoyable if you fixed its matchmaking algorithms. It's quite frustrating being a new player to the game and being matched to a Rank 1 killer, and I can only imagine it's all the same a boring experience for him if he keeps getting matched to people that hardly know what to do yet.

Another thing to take into consideration is how long it takes sometimes to find a new match. It goes from just a couple of minutes to somewhere between 10-15 minutes, so take in mind a little patience will be required.

Update: Rank systems have changed now, in my opinion they've improved quite a bit, but I still see many high-mmr players complaining about it. So it's still not 100% solved but at least they're trying.

Pros:
-This game is addicting, you'll have a love hate relationship with it
-This is the perfect friend game to play and test your friendship skills

Cons:
-The hitboxes are broken for killers
-Toxic/troll breeding ground

All in All I LOVE THIS GAME. And I also sometimes curse this game. But I will always recommend it because I always have a blast, even when I'm mad at it lol definitely worth the buy

As fog slowly gathers around you, you fall into a nightmarish game of hide and seek, the smell of must and death in your nose. all you hear is your heart beating as a hatchet shoots out from the fog and buries itself hilt deep in the tree next to your head. 
Welcome to Dead By Daylight

I've played this game for a very long time. I've had thousands of hours on console and five hundred hours on PC. From all that, I must say, this game is pretty good. Keep in mind, the more you play it, it starts to get repetitive and boring. There are a lot of broken mechanics in this game that I don’t think will be fixed anytime soon. I recommend you play with friends (I don’t find it fun without playing with others, but that’s just my opinion). Summary I rate this game a 7.1/10.

The new matching system is a totally failure. It does not make the matching faster, yet matches players with different skill levels together.
